thread.title: Seattle and Other Tech Cities Buck National Declines in the Office Market

author: Keiko Morris
title: Seattle and Other Tech Cities Buck National Declines in the Office Market
text:
Concessions from office landlords are on the rise nationwide, but in technology-centric markets, deal sweeteners such as free rent periods and remodeling allowances are waning.
In 2017, Seattle, the San Francisco Bay Area, Boston, Atlanta, Austin and other tech hubs were among the handful of office markets in which landlord concessions declined and effective rents increased compared with the previous year, according to Savills Studleyâ€™s 2018 Effective Rent Index.
